mapper.select: SELECT priv.code FROM APP_PBE.TE_PRIVILEGES priv JOIN APP_PBE.TE_PRIV_IN_ROLES priv_role ON priv.code = priv_role.te_priv_code JOIN APP_PBE.TE_ROLES role ON priv_role.te_role_code = role.code JOIN APP_PBE.TI_USER_IN_ROLES usr_role ON role.code = usr_role.te_role_code JOIN APP_PBE.TRAINING_INSTITUTION_USERS usr ON usr_role.ti_user_id = usr.id WHERE usr.login = #{login}

SELECT priv.code FROM APP_PBE.TE_PRIVILEGES priv JOIN APP_PBE.TE_PRIV_IN_ROLES priv_role ON priv.code = priv_role.te_priv_code JOIN APP_PBE.TE_ROLES role ON priv_role.te_role_code = role.code JOIN APP_PBE.TE_IND_USER_IN_ROLES usr_role ON role.code = usr_role.te_role_code JOIN APP_PBE.INDIVIDUAL_USERS usr ON usr_role.inu_id = usr.inu_id JOIN APP_PBE.INDIVIDUALS ind ON ind.id = usr.ind_id WHERE ind.pesel = #{pesel}

SELECT inu_id inuId, ind.pesel pesel, usr.verification_code verificationCode, usr.is_active active FROM APP_PBE.INDIVIDUAL_USERS usr JOIN APP_PBE.INDIVIDUALS ind ON ind.id = usr.ind_id WHERE ind.pesel = #{pesel}
